About

Frequently Asked Questions






Frequently Asked Questions









Documents on the History of U.S. Foreign Relations

I am interested in doing research in Department of State records. Where
                        can I find Department documents?

I am interested in information about the career of a former Department
                        employee. Where can I find information on employee records?

I am interested in historical photographs of the Department of State.
                        Where can I find them?

What is Foreign Relations of the United
                        States?

I would like to purchase a FRUS volume. How can I
                        do so?

What formats are FRUS volumes available
                        in?

When will the FRUS volume on … be
                        published?

Do I need to request permission to quote from a FRUS volume?



About the Office of the Historian

How can I get a job in the Office of the Historian?

Does the Office of the Historian offer internships?

Can I receive updates on activities at the Office of the Historian?



Department History

Why is the Department called the Department of State?

Why does the Department of State have possession of the Great Seal of the
                        United States?



Diplomatic Relations

When did the United States start/break off relations with …?

What country was the first to recognize the United States?

Who was the first U.S. Consul?

When was the first U.S. treaty signed?

What was the first U.S. treaty with a non-European nation?

What was the first U.S. treaty to be ratified under the
                        Constitution?

When and where was the first U.S. consular post established?



The Secretaries of State

How many Secretaries of State have there been?

Has any member of the Foreign Service served as Secretary of State?

Who was the first woman to serve as Secretary of State?

Who was the first African American to serve as Secretary of State?

Were there equivalents to the Secretary of State prior to the
                        Constitution?

Who was the first Secretary of State to travel outside the United States
                        while in office?

Who was the first Secretary of State to travel outside the United States
                        on official business?



Ambassadors and Chiefs of Mission

Who was the first Ambassador to …?

Who were the first U.S. Ambassadors?

How many U.S. Ambassadors have been killed by militants?



The Foreign Service

What was the origin of the Foreign Service?

When was the Consular Service established?

When did U.S. consuls first receive a salary?

Who were the first professional consular appointees?

What was the forerunner of the Foreign Service Examination?

When was the present-day Foreign Service established?
